docs.lead_paragraph: A western Michigan couple with 12 sons is waiting to find out whether baby No. 13 keeps the streak going.

docs.lead_paragraph: They weigh as little as a pound yet force some of the toughest choices in all of medicine. Extremely premature babies face big differences in how hard hospitals try to save them, a study finds.

headline.main: Hospital Efforts to Save Very Premature Babies Vary Widely
headline.print_headline: Hospital Efforts to Save Very Premature Babies Vary Widely

docs.snippet: They weigh as little as a pound yet force some of the toughest choices in all of medicine. Extremely premature babies face big differences in how hard hospitals try to save them, a study finds.

docs.lead_paragraph: A small minority of babies born a week or two before what is considered the point of viability can survive, a finding that could affect the abortion debate.

headline.main: Premature Babies May Survive at 22 Weeks if Treated, Study Finds
headline.print_headline: Preterm Babies Can Be Viable at Earlier Birth

docs.abstract: Comprehensive study published in New England Journal of Medicine finds that small minority of acutely premature babies born before 22 weeks, which had been considered point of viability, can survive outside the womb; discovery alters calculus for how aggressively very premature babies should be treated and is certain to have profound impact on abortion debate.
docs.snippet: A small minority of babies born a week or two before what is considered the point of viability can survive, a finding that could affect the abortion debate.

keywords.value: National Institute of Child Health and Human Development
keywords.name: organizations

docs.lead_paragraph: The mother of three of Floyd Mayweather's children has sued the undefeated champion for defamation over his recent comments about a 2010 domestic violence incident in Las Vegas.

headline.main: For Breech Births, C-Sections May Be the Safest Choice

docs.abstract: For babies in the breech position, cesarean delivery may be a safer choice.

docs.lead_paragraph: A baby girl conceived through surrogacy will be removed from her biological mother and live with her father and his gay partner instead, a High Court judge in Britain has ruled.

headline.main: Gay Couple Win UK Surrogacy Battle Over Baby Girl
headline.print_headline: Gay Couple Win UK Surrogacy Battle Over Baby Girl

docs.snippet: A baby girl conceived through surrogacy will be removed from her biological mother and live with her father and his gay partner instead, a High Court judge in Britain has ruled.

docs.lead_paragraph: In TLC’s new quiz show, expectant parents try to win prizes by answering trivia questions while the woman is in labor.

headline.main: ‘Labor Games’ Is a Brilliantly Absurd TV Game Show
headline.print_headline: No Pain, No Game: Prepping for Parenthood

docs.abstract: Neil Genzlinger Critic's Notebook concludes that TLC's new show Labor Games, in which expectant parents compete for prizes by answering trivia questions while woman is in labor, may be most brilliant and head-shaking game show idea in history; opines premises of latest crop of game shows may be out of control.
docs.snippet: In TLC’s new quiz show, expectant parents try to win prizes by answering trivia questions while the woman is in labor.
